titles.title: To ensure that any person who served aboard the vessel HMT Queen Mary and who was awarded the American Theater Campaign Ribbon for service in World War II is able to obtain a replacement for that ribbon if it has been lost, destroyed, or rendered unfit for use.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on National Security.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Personnel.

bill.summary: 6/7/1995--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of the Army to replace any lost, destroyed, or damaged World War II decoration known as the American Theater Campaign Ribbon that was awarded to any person properly awarded such decoration for service during World War II .
